title: Lavender Lemon Drop Martinis
description: This Lavender Lemon Drop Martini is a floral, citrusy twist on the classic cocktail—light, refreshing, and just fancy enough to feel like a treat. If you’re looking for an easy spring cocktail that tastes like sunshine and garden parties, this is it! I’ve been craving a homemade lemon drop since the first bag of Meyer lemons hit the market, and while I debated saving this one for Mother’s Day, it’s just too good to wait. Continue reading Lavender Lemon Drop Martinis at Joy the Baker.
author: Joy the Baker
